description: Demolition of existing conservatory and detached garage and erection of single storey rear and side extension. Raising roof ridge height and erection of rear hip to gable, and rear and side dormer roof extensions with installation of 1no. front rooflight to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The description of proposed works as set out on the submitted application form  does not duly  reflect the full scope of proposed works  as reflected on the submitted application  drawings.  The submission also fails to provide adequate details on the raising of the  rear terrace and  no mitigation details are provided in respect of introduction of  suitable privacy  measures in relation to the neighbouring properties.  It is considered that the proposed development would have an unacceptable impact on the character and appearance of the dwellinghouse and an unacceptable impact upon amenity of the occupiers of neighbouring nos 17 and 21 Cranes Park Avenue  thereby conflicting with Policy D3 in  the London Plan  (2021) and Core Strategy Policy DM10 (2012) and in the Residential Design Guidance  SPD (2013).
